Text: Never heard of this. Did King Diamond become a Christian? Guess I'll have to find out. Thanks

@swampownr1: Well.. It ain't over until.. ..never. At least until the man is dead.. Then he/we move on, but where..?

So you never know what's cooking in the kitchen.. The smell suggests something strange, but then again; what you're smelling could just be the preparations for the sauce, not the main dish... :-)
